title: The Commencement Certificate / Building permit shall remain valid for a period of one year commencing from the date of its issue (1) if the work is not commenced within the valid period
clause_text: The Commencement Certificate / Building permit shall remain valid for a period of one year commencing from the date of its issue (1) if the work is not commenced within the valid period. This permission does not entitle you to develop the land which does not vest in you.
section: Duties and Responsibilities of Geotechnical Engineer :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The Commencement Certificate / Building permit shall remain valid for a period of one year commencing from the date of its issue (1) if the work is not commenced within the valid period.
